canConnect.message: You can connect your PREreview profile to your ORCID record.

willAddPrereviews.message: We’ll add your PREreviews to your ORCID record.

sendYouToOrcid.message: We’ll send you to ORCID, where they will ask you to log in and grant PREreview access to your record there. You may have already done these steps, and ORCID will return you to PREreview.

cannotConnectRecord.message: Sorry, we can’t connect your record

youDeniedAccess.message: You have denied PREreview access to your ORCID record.

unableToConnect.message: We’re unable to connect your record right now.

unableToDisconnect.message: We’re unable to disconnect your record right now.

canDisconnect.message: You can disconnect your PREreview profile from your ORCID record.

stopAddingPrereviews.message: We’ll stop adding new PREreviews to your ORCID record.

canReconnect.message: You will be able to reconnect it at any time.
